title: Calibre E-Book Manager Version 0.9.40
description:
Calibre is a free and open source e-book library management application developed by users of e-books for users of e-books. It has a cornucopia of features divided into the following main categories:

    Library Management.Download metadata and covers.
    E-book conversion.Converts ANY format to ANY OTHER format.
    Syncing to e-book reader devices.
    Downloading news from the web and converting it into e-book form.
    Comprehensive e-book viewer.
    Content server for online access to your book collection.
    

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is the newest version,just released today.


Remember,when you add books to Calibre it makes new copies.The originals are useless and can be deleted.
